title: Mexican families get quick reunions with migrant relatives
description: Tears flowed amid heartfelt embraces as Mexican families were allowed brief reunions at the border with relatives who migrated to the United States

title: Menahem Pressler, pianist and Beaux Arts Trio founder, dies at 99
description: The lauded musician helped start the trio in 1955 and continued playing concerts long after it disbanded in 2008.

title: Senior Ukrainian officials fear counterattack may not live up to hype
description: Ukraine is readying an assault to seize back territory occupied by Russia but Kyiv worries any gains could fall short of Western expectations and undercut support

title: In London, Brazil's Lula calls for efforts to free Assange
description: After attending the coronation of King Charles III in London, Brazil’s President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva denounced the lack of concerted efforts to free WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange, who has spent four years in Britain’s Belmarsh Prison

title: Finally, King Charles III is crowned, in a coronation medieval and modern
description: After the longest wait ever, King Charles III finally sat on his Coronation Chair, above the Stone of Destiny, while a heavy crown was fitted upon his head.

title: Prince Harry an odd man out at father's coronation spectacle
description: Prince Harry arrived at his father’s coronation alone and he left alone

title: Thousands of Israelis protest government legal change plans
description: Tens of thousands of Israelis are demonstrating against a contentious government plan to overhaul the judiciary, demanding the changes to be scrapped rather than delayed

title: A visual comparison of the coronations of Queen Elizabeth and King Charles
description: Much has changed since the coronation of his mother nearly 70 years ago — although at the heart of the ceremonial day are traditions dating back hundreds of years.

title: Diana knew she wouldn’t be queen — and doubted Charles wanted the crown
description: “I’d like to be a queen of people’s hearts, in people’s hearts, but I don’t see myself being queen of this country," Princess Diana said in 1995.

title: Ukraine says it shot down hypersonic Russian missile with Patriot system
description: Russia's hypersonic missile Kinzhal travels five times faster than the speed of sound — and until now had been unstoppable by Ukraine.

title: Prince Harry, solo, stayed on the sidelines of the coronation
description: Harry had no formal role in the coronation service at Westminster Abbey and didn’t join family members for the finale moment on the Buckingham Palace balcony.

title: At king’s coronation, royal grandchildren charm audiences with yawns, waves
description: King Charles III's grandchildren – Princes George and Louis, and Princess Charlotte – stole the show while relations between William and Harry appeared frosty.

title: Attackers kill Pakistani Sikh in drive-by shooting in Lahore
description: Pakistani police say a Sikh was killed by unknown assailants in a drive-by shooting in the eastern city of Lahore

title: 176 dead, many more missing after Congo floods
description: The governor of Congo’s South Kivu province says flooding near Lake Kivu has killed 176 people, with many more still missing

title: The coronation of King Charles III: Memorable moments in photos and videos
description: Photos and videos from the coronation of King Charles III and Queen Camilla.

title: Pro-Kremlin writer wounded in car explosion in Russia
description: A car bomb wounded Russian nationalist writer Zakhar Prilepin and killed one person in the western Nizhny Novgorod region, Russia authorities said.

title: In coronation, Queen Camilla secures her ‘royal dignity’
description: Camilla’s coronation alongside King Charles III marks the apex of one of the messiest, most publicly adjudicated love affairs of modern times.

title: Pro-Kremlin novelist injured in car explosion in Russia
description: Russian state news agency Tass says the car of a prominent pro-Kremlin novelist exploded in Russia on Saturday, injuring him and killing his driver

title: ‘Not My King’ protesters detained by London police on Coronation Day
description: At a protest in London, thousands clamored against the coronation of King Charles III and called for the monarchy to be abolished.

title: Burials set in Serbia for some of victims of mass shootings
description: Funerals are being held in Serbia for some of the victims of two mass shootings that happened in just two days, leaving 17 people dead and 21 wounded, many of them children

title: Ukraine downs Russian hypersonic missile with US Patriot
description: Ukraine’s air force claims to have downed a Russian hypersonic missile over Kyiv using newly acquired American Patriot defense systems, the first known time the country has been able to intercept one of Moscow’s most modern missiles

title: Indian troops kill 2 rebels in Kashmir in ongoing operations
description: Indian soldiers have killed two suspected militants in ongoing counterinsurgency operations in Kashmir a day after rebels fighting against Indian rule killed five soldiers in the disputed Himalayan region

title: The Latest: Crowds grow outside palace for king's coronation
description: Crowds are growing outside Buckingham Palace and guests are arriving at Westminster Abbey for the coronation of King Charles III

title: Sudan envoys begin talks amid pressure to end conflict
description: The U.S. and Saudi Arabia say that Sudan’s warring sides are beginning talks aimed at firming up a shaky cease-fire after three weeks of fierce fighting that has killed hundreds and pushed Sudan to the brink of collapse

title: 5 things to look for during King Charles III's coronation
description: King Charles III’s coronation is a chance to unite people with the history and pageantry of the monarchy, but those traditions are also full of potential controversies as he tries to show that the monarchy still has a role to play in modern Britain

title: Qatar flies aid into Sudan, airlifts evacuees amid fighting
description: Qatar has flown a relief flight into Sudan carrying some 40 tons of food

title: Live updates: Coronation Day for King Charles III and Queen Camilla
description: King Charles and Queen Camilla's coronation will take place at Westminster Abbey on May 6, followed by a parade through London.
